Code.Name: Reference price
Code.Description: Code identifying a reference price.

Code.Name: Price includes tax
Code.Description: Code specifying that the price is inclusive of tax.

Code.Name: Buyer suggested retail price
Code.Description: The suggested retail price as suggested or determined by the party purchasing the goods.

Code.Name: Ocean charges rate
Code.Description: The charges imposed by the ocean transportation industry above and beyond the basic freight.

Code.Name: Not subject to fluctuation
Code.Description: Not subject to escalation or adjustment.

Code.Name: Subject to escalation
Code.Description: Subject to increase or development by successive stages.

Code.Name: Subject to price adjustment
Code.Description: Code specifying that the price is subject to adjustment.

Code.Name: Subject to escalation and price adjustment
Code.Description: Subject to increase or development by successive stages and price adjustment.

Code.Name: Fluctuation conditions not specified
Code.Description: Code specifying that the fluctuation conditions are not identified.

Code.Name: All in price
Code.Description: Firm price for specified work.

Code.Name: New price
Code.Description: A price valid from an effective date/time/period.

Code.Name: Old price
Code.Description: A price valid prior to an effective date/time/period of a new price.

Code.Name: Per week
Code.Description: To indicate that the given price applies per week.

Code.Name: Price on application
Code.Description: Price can be obtained on request from seller.

Code.Name: Unpacked price
Code.Description: The price given is the price of the item without packaging.

Code.Name: Trade price
Code.Description: Discount price available to all customers except the retail customer.

Code.Name: Firm price
Code.Description: Price which will remain unchanged for a given time period.

Code.Name: Material share of item price
Code.Description: The per unit cost of referenced material based on a given quotation for that material.

Code.Name: Labour share of item price
Code.Description: The labour component of the per-unit item price.

Code.Name: Transport share of item price
Code.Description: The transport component of the per-unit item price.

Code.Name: Packing share of item price
Code.Description: The packing component of the per-unit item price.

Code.Name: Tooling share of item price
Code.Description: The tooling component of the per-unit item price.

Code.Name: Temporary vehicle charge
Code.Description: The component of a price charged for providing a temporary vehicle.

Code.Name: Price component due to interest
Code.Description: This is the component of the price which is charged due to interest.

Code.Name: Price component due to management services
Code.Description: This is the component of the price which is charged due to management services rendered.

Code.Name: Price component due to maintenance
Code.Description: This is the component of the price which is charged due to maintenance.

Code.Name: Individual buyer price
Code.Description: A price which is available to an individual buyer as opposed to an institutional buyer.

Code.Name: Group buying price
Code.Description: A price which is available to a buying group.

Code.Name: Group member buying price
Code.Description: A special price given to a member of a buying group.

Code.Name: Pre-payment price
Code.Description: A special price if pre-payment is made for the article ordered.

Code.Name: Retail price - excluding taxes
Code.Description: Retail price not including any applicable taxes.

Code.Name: Suggested retail price - excluding taxes
Code.Description: Suggested retail price not including any applicable taxes.

Code.Name: Agreed minimum price
Code.Description: The minimum price agreed between trading partners.

Code.Name: Statutory minimum retail price
Code.Description: The legal minimum retail price.

Code.Name: Cost reimbursement price
Code.Description: A code to indicate that the price represents the reimbursement of the actual costs incurred.

Code.Name: Market price
Code.Description: A code to indicate that the given price is applicable under normal competitive conditions.

Code.Name: Open tender price
Code.Description: A code to indicate that the price mentioned has been submitted in the context of an open tender.

Code.Name: Base price
Code.Description: The base price of a product or service.

Code.Name: Base price difference
Code.Description: The difference in price against a base price.

Code.Name: Adjustable price prior to acceptance
Code.Description: A price which can be adjusted due to economic conditions between the date of offer and the date of acceptance.

Code.Name: Revisable price after acceptance
Code.Description: A price which can be revised due to economic conditions between the date of acceptance of the order and the date of delivery.

Code.Name: Provisional ceiling price
Code.Description: A provisional price which cannot be exceeded.

Code.Name: Adjustable provisional ceiling price
Code.Description: A provisional price which cannot be exceeded but which can be adjusted due to economic conditions between the date of offer and the date of acceptance.

Code.Name: Revisable provisional ceiling price
Code.Description: A provisional price which cannot be exceeded but is revisable due to economic conditions between the date of acceptance of the order through to the date of delivery.

Code.Name: Revisable provisional price
Code.Description: A provisional price which is revisable due to economic conditions between the date of acceptance of the order and the date of delivery.

Code.Name: Adjustable provisional price
Code.Description: A provisional price which is adjustable due to economic conditions between the date of offer and the date of acceptance.

Code.Name: Area price
Code.Description: Price connected to a geographical area.

Code.Name: Area system price
Code.Description: A basis price applied to a geographic area.

Code.Name: Special balance regulation price
Code.Description: The price applicable to the power generated as a result of a special balance regulation.

Code.Name: Balance regulation price
Code.Description: The price applicable to the power generated as a result of a balance regulation.

Code.Name: Upward balance regulation price
Code.Description: The price applicable to the power generated as a result of an upward balance regulation.

Code.Name: Downward balance regulation price
Code.Description: The price applicable to the power generated as a result of a downward balance regulation.

Code.Name: Agreed minimum retail price
Code.Description: The agreed minimum retail price for an article.

Code.Name: Marked retail price
Code.Description: The retail price of a product which has been marked on the products packaging.

Code.Name: Active ingredient
Code.Description: Code specifying that price is based on the active ingredient.

Code.Name: Alternate price
Code.Description: A substitute cost.

Code.Name: Advice price
Code.Description: Code specifying an advice price.

Code.Name: Broker price
Code.Description: Code specifying a broker price.

Code.Name: Catalogue price
Code.Description: Price per unit of quantity of a product as specified in a catalogue.

Code.Name: Current domestic value
Code.Description: The present worth of a thing which comes from ones homeland, in terms of money or goods.

Code.Name: Contract price
Code.Description: Price per unit of quantity of a product/service as agreed in a contract between parties.

Code.Name: Current price
Code.Description: Price at time of transaction, but subject to future change.

Code.Name: Consumer unit
Code.Description: Code specifying that the price is based on consumer unit.

Code.Name: Confirmed unit price
Code.Description: The value of a single item that proves to be correct.

Code.Name: Declared customs unit value
Code.Description: A clearly known duty on a single item which is imposed by law.

Code.Name: Dealer adjusted price
Code.Description: The necessary or desirable changes that the sales agency makes with respect to the value of the product.

Code.Name: Distributor price
Code.Description: The cost associated with the agency that markets goods.

Code.Name: Discount price
Code.Description: A reduction from the usual list value.

Code.Name: Dealer price
Code.Description: Code specifying a dealer price.

Code.Name: Discount amount allowed
Code.Description: A certain price up to which one is able to make reductions from the usual list value.

Code.Name: price
Code.Description: Price registered at European Commission Steel and Carbon office (DG III).

Code.Name: Estimated price
Code.Description: Code specifying an estimated price.

Code.Name: Expected unit price
Code.Description: The anticipated value of a single item.

Code.Name: Freight/charge rate
Code.Description: The price that is either a freight rate or a rate on which freight charges are calculated.

Code.Name: Gross unit price
Code.Description: Unit price to which allowances and charges apply.

Code.Name: Invoice price
Code.Description: Price per unit of quantity of a product as specified on an invoice.

Code.Name: Labelling price
Code.Description: Retail price of the buyer that should be printed by the producer on the articles label. The labelling price is not necessary the effective retail price.

Code.Name: Maximum order quantity price
Code.Description: The greatest amount of goods or services which one can buy to receive a certain value.

Code.Name: Minimum order quantity price
Code.Description: The least amount of goods or services that one can buy to receive a certain value.

Code.Name: Minimum release quantity price
Code.Description: The least amount of an order one can place in order to receive a certain value.

Code.Name: Manufacturers suggested retail
Code.Description: Price that reflects "Sales to other manufacturers" or "Sales for resale".

Code.Name: Maximum release quantity price
Code.Description: The greatest amount of an order that one can place in order to receive a certain value.

Code.Name: Not-to-exceed price
Code.Description: Code specifying a price that cannot be increased.

Code.Name: No quote
Code.Description: No price available.

Code.Name: Net unit price
Code.Description: Unit price to which no allowances and charges apply.

Code.Name: Net weight
Code.Description: Code specifying a net weight price.

Code.Name: Ocean freight rate
Code.Description: The price per pricing unit of ocean transportation services for moving cargo from one location to another.

Code.Name: Price break quantity(s)
Code.Description: Numerical amounts of goods or services which are associated with different sums of money. As the amount goes up, the price per individual item decreases.

Code.Name: Unit price beginning quantity
Code.Description: The starting amount at which you can place a value on a single item.

Code.Name: Prepaid freight charges
Code.Description: The cost of shipping is paid before the goods are shipped.

Code.Name: Provisional price
Code.Description: Price per unit of quantity of a product as provisionally agreed.

Code.Name: Producers price
Code.Description: The value that the maker of a good places on an item.

Code.Name: Promotional price
Code.Description: The value that is placed on an item that is being developed. The idea is to sell this product for less than one normally would, and make up for it by selling a larger quantity.

Code.Name: Gross weight
Code.Description: Code specifying a gross weight price.

Code.Name: Quote price
Code.Description: Price per unit of quantity of a product as specified in a quote.

Code.Name: Resale price
Code.Description: Price per unit of quantity of a product to be used for resale.

Code.Name: Retail price
Code.Description: Price per unit of quantity of a product to be used for retail.

Code.Name: Ship and debit
Code.Description: To transport goods and be owed money by the customer for the services performed.

Code.Name: Suggested retail price
Code.Description: Price per unit of quantity of a product suggested for retail.

Code.Name: Gross weight without wooden pallets
Code.Description: Used in steel industry.

Code.Name: To be negotiated
Code.Description: Code specifying that the price has to be negotiated.

Code.Name: Transfer
Code.Description: To carry or remove from one place, situation, or person to another.

Code.Name: Traded unit
Code.Description: Code specifying a traded unit price.

Code.Name: Theoretical weight
Code.Description: Code specifying a price based on a theoretical weight.

Code.Name: Wholesale price
Code.Description: Code specifying a wholesale price.
